thread.title: Huawei Watch finally available to pre-order, ships September 17 from $349
thread.title_full: Huawei Watch finally available to pre-order, ships September 17 from $349

title: Huawei Watch finally available to pre-order, ships September 17 from $349
text: Huawei Watch finally available to pre-order, ships September 17 from $349 Wednesday, 2 September 2015 (6 minutes ago) Huawei has finally confirmed officially where and when we can get our hands on its Android Wear smartwatch. The Huawei Watch was originally shown off at MWC in Barcelona, back in February. Now, at long last, you can pre-order it with prices ranging from $349 to $799. Huawei confirmed in a press release this morning [â€¦]
